name: Castle of no Escape 2
description: Explore 6 x 6 x 6 = 216 rooms of randomly generated hazards and enemies while collecting the necessary artefacts. Hundreds of monsters are roaming inside, guarding the sword shards â€” the last known thing to be capable of defeating the demonic castle owner.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 64MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 3.0 GHz, 4 cores Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Sound Card Additional Notes: DirectInput (installs automatically in Windows 10)
